short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert text to a calendar-ready entry in one click. Powered by AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert unstructured text to an AI-generated calendar entry. Add it to Google Calendar, or email it to yourself. 

Agenda Hero for Chrome eliminates the tedious, click-heavy, and disruptive task of manually creating calendar entries. Convert full paragraphs of text into a calendar-ready event in one click. Review the result, modify it if desired, then send it to your calendar. 

Agenda Hero makes it possible to stay on top of the flurry of schedule information you receive in newsletters, email, social media, and on the web. 

HOW IT WORKS
üåé Select event-related text you want to convert
üìÜ Click the Add to Calendar button that appears
ü™Ñ The text will transform into a structured calendar entry
‚úÖ Check the result and make modifications if desired
‚úâÔ∏è Add it directly to Google Calendar, or email yourself the invite

Agenda Hero works seamlessly in your browser. No copying, no pasting, and especially no extra clicks, required. Use Agenda Hero in webmail, social media, and across the Internet. Agenda Hero for Chrome works across:
‚Ä¢ Google
‚Ä¢ LinkedIn
‚Ä¢ Facebook
‚Ä¢ X, formerly known as Twitter
‚Ä¢ And more!

ABOUT AGENDA HERO
Agenda Hero helps people spend less time working on schedules and more time enjoying them. Designed for simplicity and joy, Agenda Hero is a collaborative platform for schedules, turning unstructured into beautiful, actionable, structured, and sharable plans. We are on a mission to save people time and clicks.
